properties.entry:
INSERT INTO TB_PLAN_OPTION ( PLAN_NO , PLAN_TITLE , PLAN_SDATE , PLAN_EDATE , PLAN_AGE , PLAN_ACC , PLAN_BUDGET , PLAN_SCRAP_YN , PLAN_PRIVATE , PLAN_MEMO , PLAN_TYPE , PLAN_TRANS , USER_NO
) VALUES ( SEQ_PLANNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_PLAN_MAP ( PLAN_MAP_NO , PLAN_DAY , PLAN_PLACE , PLAN_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PLANMAPNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SEQ_PLANNO.NEXTVAL - 1 )
